words.source: H6258 conj. + adv. עַתָּה 'now'; KJV 'go therefore now', ESV 'now go', NASB 'so now'
H3212 Qal imv. 2mp of יָלַךְ 'to go, walk'; KJV 'go', ESV 'go', NASB 'go'
H5647 Qal imv. 2mp of עָבַד 'to work, serve'; KJV 'work', ESV 'work', NASB 'work'
H8401 conj. + n.ms תֶּבֶן 'straw'; KJV 'straw', ESV 'straw', NASB 'straw'
H3808 neg. particle; all trans. agree
H5414 Niphal impf. 3ms of נָתַן 'to give'; KJV 'shall be given', ESV 'will be given', NASB 'will be given'
prep. l- + 2mp suff.; all trans. agree
H8506 conj. + n.ms תֹּכֶן 'measurement, quota, fixed amount'; KJV 'the tale of', ESV 'the same number of', NASB 'the quota of'
H3843 n.fp לְבֵנָה 'brick'; KJV 'bricks', ESV 'bricks', NASB 'bricks'
H5414 Qal impf. 2mp + 3ms suff. of נָתַן 'to give'; KJV 'shall ye deliver', ESV 'you shall still deliver', NASB 'you must deliver'
